text: Margachitina is an extinct genus of chitinozoans. It was described by Alfred Eisenack in 1968.Margachitina at ChitDB: Chitinozoans of Baltica. ==Species== * Margachitina banwyensis Mullins, 2000 * Margachitina margaritana (Eisenack, 1937) * Margachitina poculum (Collinson & Schwalb, 1955) ==References== Category:Prehistoric marine animals Category:Fossil taxa described in 1968
title: Margachitina
